sentences.en: A maniac had gouged several holes in the priceless painting.
sentences.cn: 有个狂徒在那幅价值连城的画上乱凿了几个洞.

sentences.en: A number of priceless works of art were stolen from the gallery.
sentences.cn: 美术馆中许多价值连城的艺术品被盗。
价值连城的古文物收藏

sentences.en: His priceless collection of Chinese art and artefacts was garnered over three decades.
sentences.cn: 他那批价值连城的中国艺术品和手工艺品是花了30多年才收集起来的。

sentences.en: Priceless antique furniture was destroyed in the fire at the stately home.
sentences.cn: 那座富丽堂皇的宅第里价值连城的古董家具在大火中付之一炬了.

sentences.en: That cup is priceless. You can't put a value on it.
sentences.cn: 那个杯子价值连城，无法定价。
这些调查结果可能是极为重要的.

sentences.en: The house is crammed with priceless furniture and works of art.
sentences.cn: 房子里摆满了昂贵的家具和艺术品。

sentences.en: The influence of someone like David York will be priceless.
sentences.cn: 像大卫·约克这样的人能带来非常积极的影响。

sentences.en: The palace is full of priceless antiques.
sentences.cn: 宫殿里到处都是无价的古玩.

sentences.en: They are priceless, unique and irreplaceable.
sentences.cn: 它们是独一无二、不可替代的无价之宝。

sentences.en: Wilt thou reject that priceless benefit? "
sentences.cn: 你难道要反对这没本钱的利益 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Workers scrambled to carry priceless objects out of harm's way.
sentences.cn: 工人们争先恐后地将价值连城的物品运到安全的地方。

sentences.en: Works of art and priceless historical records were ruthlessly destroyed.
sentences.cn: 艺术品和珍贵史料全被无情地毁掉了.

trans.tran_cn: 无价的，极贵重的，非常有趣的，极荒谬的
